website_summaries.verdict: A good gentle exfoliating soap bar with some unique ingredients.
pros: Contains Arabica coffee for gentle exfoliation, kukui oil, coconut oil, olive oil, sunflower oil, and organic bladderwrack seaweed
cons: The scent is a little strange and the bar doesn't last very long

customer_reviews.title: The only soap I use!
customer_reviews.text: As a licensed esthetician I highly recommend this product for acneic or problem skin. It is great for the face as well as the body. It has a very pleasent smell and excellent ingredients. You won't regret trying this soap. Make sure to store in a soap case or dish when not using to prevent water from dissipating it.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite product. I have dry sensitive skin, and using this daily has helped with the dry skin on my legs tremendously. I love the scrub I get from this soap. Not great for sensitive areas. Almost no scent at all which is fine by me. Maybe some slight improvement for cellulite on my legs, but I wasn't expecting much there. One bar lasts about 2 weeks. Wish there were a 3pack available. Going to try other products by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Love how my skin feels after the use and I can say I've seen reduction in cellulite! Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the Arabic Coffee and Cinnamon description but didn’t realize until I received it that its unscented? What a shame. Why use high fragrant ingredients like those two just to make a bar of soap unscented. Even though it is unscented, it had a very sterile, hospital scent to me, which I don’t like. The exfoliation is very minimal to the point I wouldn’t consider it exfoliating. Again, why use ingredients like Coffee, something that’s often used as an exfoliate just to make it bare minimum. Overall, just a disappointing bar of soap.
customer_reviews.author: Chris94

customer_reviews.title: This soap is AMAZING! I used it on myself and my kids
customer_reviews.text: This soap is AMAZING! I used it on myself and my kids. I also used it as a facial scrub and it made my face feel brand new; just wish it was a little bigger. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: OMG..... I have been using this for 1 week in addition to the Cream. My cellulite dimples are less noticeable. I love this stuff and will be back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Happy knitter

customer_reviews.title: Saw results for lots of skin issues
customer_reviews.text: At the price it is worth a try. For me this soap relieved several skin problems to some degree better than other products I've tried. During and Post-pregnancy hormonal inbalances and moving to drier air in the Southwestern United States where the water is hard due to high farming activity has led to dry, flaky, bumpy skin. Specifically, seborrheic dermatitis on my scalp, keratosis pilaris on the back of my arms, dark razor bumps on my legs, and cellulite/stretch marks due to weight gain. The soap didn't get rid of anything 100 percent but I'd say more like 75%. Mostly, I'm glad my itchiness is gone. I don't notice any fragrance on the soap and prefer it that way.
customer_reviews.author: student x

customer_reviews.title: Tried it once
customer_reviews.text: This bar was pretty small...I used to use a seaweed bar soap that had a course grit to it. Smelled awful but it changed my skin drastically. I have kp on my arms and an abnormal amount of ingrown hairs on my legs that are incredibly difficult to reduce. I was hoping this bar could replace my old one since they stopped selling it. I was kinda disappointed. While it was nice for a quick scrub it didn’t really do much for me. I think it’s overpriced, overhyped and not worth it for me personally. I wouldn’t purchase it again but it sounds like it works for many others so at least give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: M12

customer_reviews.title: This is great stuff but it doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: This felt really great on my skin. It exfoliates nicely and comfortably. I like the smell of it. I'd give it 5 stars but it was used up very quickly and is more expensive than I would like. Honestly I wouldn't mind the expense if it lasted as long as a normal bar of soap but it didn't last half that long.
customer_reviews.author: beelyo

customer_reviews.title: It's OK but not for cellulite...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice soap to wash with. Doesn't do squat for cellulite so if purchasing for that I'd look elsewhere. But I like how it cleanses so that is why the three stars. Once this bar is gone don't think I'll order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap! It works very well and my skin wasn't dry. I jusy wish that it came as a bundle. Buying one bar at a time sucks! Can you do like a set of 4 or 6 bars together? That would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: sunShyne53

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without item
customer_reviews.text: At the end of my twenties I wanted to start to head off aging early (hopefully). This bar is rough on the skin the first use or two, but the exfoliation factor is amazing. My skin feels wonderful, and after using it consistently I have noticed a great effect on skin tone and firmness in my legs in particular. I find that I do not have to do my usual messy coffee scrub nearly as often because of how well this bar exfoliates. Excellent value, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Addicted
customer_reviews.text: This soap makes you feel so good and clean! I can't believe it. I first tried it on a flyer when it was discounted at Whole Foods. After the first shower, I was hooked. I felt noticeably better and cleaner. When I finished my bar of soap, I just had to get another. I couldn't go back to other products. Its that good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliates well at first
customer_reviews.text: Works abrasively at first and then it goes to a bit softer. Great for a man's skin but it didn't stay too abrasive for long which I didn't like very much. I liked the ingredients and appreciate the non chemical list. I liked the light fragrance and it lasts awhile.
customer_reviews.author: skyeeeo

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this soap 2 days and I love it already. Exfoliates well, you can lather up a lot of suds easily without using a ton of soap and leaves your skin feeling clean and fresh. Scent is ok, not very strong but that’s not necessarily a bad thing. Though careful of overuse because I’ve noticed my skin kind of drying out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Ammonia! Gross!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this because I really like this brand. No parabens, cruelty free, right up my alley. But as I was showering I suddenly smelled a harsh chemical smell. It's the soap! It smells like ammonia. I dont know why it smells like that, but it was sooo gross. No one wants to walk around smelling like cat pee. Fortunately the smell hasn't lingered on me, but in the shower it was very strong. The exfoliant was a little harsh for me, too. Pick something else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A truly wonderful experience!
customer_reviews.text: I work hard and this soap is just Right for me!! Smells amazing like coffee or chocolate and the rough texture takes away dead skin in a flash! Too soon to see if good For cellulite but I have high hopes!!
customer_reviews.author: Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bar! I’m always skeptical buying online but wow! I bought it for the “detox” for my bumpy dry skin on my arms but saw that it helps for cellulite and decided to use it all over. Anyway it has a light general scent that’s really nice and left my skin feeling fantastic. I just got it today so will update as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: It’s good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have now been using this soap on my face for 3 days and I love it so far. It has a smooth side and a sandpaper like side. I feel it really exfoliates my skin. It isn’t scented which is nice because fragrance dries out my skin and that is what I am trying to avoid. The soap is worth every penny. It also leaves my skin feeling smooth and clean. I doesn’t leave a residue. Thanks !!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Best soap for your sensitive skin & cellulite
customer_reviews.text: Once I tried this product from a local Whole Foods, I couldn’t go back to regular soap. It treats my cellulite and my winter eczema. I use it year round for scrubbing head to toe. Great as an exfoliater. Now my boyfriend has tried it, and won’t go back either.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. Would not be without it. I have seen a reduction in the "orange peel skin" on upper arms and thighs
customer_reviews.author: chezjacque

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this product
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this product. I bought it for my wife and she loves it, and now I have started using it as an exfoliating soap on my self. I love the smell and that it makes my rough skin soft. We now need his and hers bars we use it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t really help with cellulite
customer_reviews.text: Lol I don’t know about this soap helping cellulite. But its a good overall bar of soap. If your looking for a miracle in soap this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great - I'm a repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: Hard to give a detailed description of why ya like soap. I mean, after all its just soap. But I can say that everything they describe in their own product description is accurate. I have pretty much "normal" skin - not oily and not dry. Maybe there in lies the value of my review. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Broke me out completely! I used twice a day for two weeks and my skin broke out every day. I think they put oil in this soap, which definitely made me breakout even more. Skin care is such a sham, lol. All you can do is try and waste money because 99% of the time it wont work. The things that slightly work are too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing super spectacular here. Soap. It gets us clean. Arrived in a nice package, that’s about it. Smells were very faint, wasn’t very moisturizing or stripping. Didn’t aggravate my skin. For the price, I’d go with Yardley soaps or Dove. Cheaper and mire fragrant.
customer_reviews.author: Joni S.

customer_reviews.title: Product is fabulous for facial
customer_reviews.text: Was have severe acne problems on my face. Tried several other products but to no avail. Seaweed was suggested and now after 2 tries this seaweed soap seems to be the remedy. Have also noticed a decrease in my oily skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ayana

customer_reviews.title: Good soap, but no smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking forward to the flavor of the coffee and cinnamon, but it smells like neither. It just smells like soap. I would have liked much, much more scent, otherwise, I just could have bought the unscented bar.
customer_reviews.author: oregonrunningguy

customer_reviews.title: Cleansing
customer_reviews.text: It makes my skin feel clean and refresh. I've noticed a nice glow on my skin. I would recommend this cleansing bar for twicw weekly detox.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Tootie

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: Just the right amount of exfoliation I need post-gym. Doesn't really have a smell and doesn't irritate sensitive skin. Didn't even need a body brush or loofah because the bar's texture scrubs dirt off skin on its own!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disintegrates quickly, really disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This bar of soap literally split in half and fell apart after just one use. It's really too bad because the first time I used it, I loved the little exfoliating beads and the scent. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Stacks

customer_reviews.title: I canNOT live without this soap.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several soaps, looking for a good non-toxic option that works well for my face and body, and I fell in love with this one. I always have an extra on hand, for in case I run out of the other before the next ship date. It leaves my skin feeling exfoliated, clean, and soft, never dry. Loveee it.
customer_reviews.author: J McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap, made my skin feel so nice. The only negative is, the color bleeds and marks of black ran down my white tub. Just make sure to keep it in a soap dish. Defiantly would order this soap again!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: scent doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: The scent was wonderful for the first week, but then gone gone gone. The soap still works and exfoliates well, but just a soap smell is left. I was disappointed in that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice exfoliating soap
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice exfoliating soap. It is great to find and item like this that is tree nut and seed free. It has a pleasant smell and leaves my skin feeling soft.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B F

customer_reviews.title: People noticed more skin's smoothness more
customer_reviews.text: After using the bar for just a day or two, I started getting more comments about my skin and how smooth it looks. I usually get comments about my skin, but two different individuals said it looked like porcelain. I'm 56 and I don't wear make-up.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. It lasts forever. Even though it is black it doesn’t stain or leave residue. The scent is wonderful. Can be masculine or feminine. Very pleased with it and I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: felicia

customer_reviews.title: I got this to work a nice gleen to my face.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, but I am pleased and look forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Planet Beydogga's.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely not exfoliating. It's just a regular soap too me. The exfoliating stuff is only on some parts. I don't always feel the little bead things. Also don't leave in the shower. It statts deteriorating.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail monk

customer_reviews.title: instantly dissolves mineral sunscreen! exfoliates even with gloves/lufa
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a product like this to dissolve mineral sunscreens, which can be difficult to remove from skin after use. They are easily removed by this product without excessive washing or scrubbing. It has zero scent - odd and wonderful. Its exfoliating even when used with scrubbing hand gloves or a lufa in the shower. If used in yours hands or directly onto the skin, it's also very exfoliating.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Better than soap
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I absolutely love how this makes my face feel so clean. I don't really need to use much for it to build up lather and when I need a little extra help, it gently exfoliates every part of my body. It's a bit pricey for a small bar but well worth it. I'm highly satisfied and will reorder. I've used it for about 2 months and still have about half bar. GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: WendyPar

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliation Personified
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this soap. It also feels so good on my skin. You can use it all over your body, except for the very sensitive areas. I enjoy using this soap from the very first time I used it. I will buy it again. I don't like strong scents and this soap does not have a strong perfume scent.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Wish it did everything it claimed to
customer_reviews.text: Product said that it helps diminish cellulite, it does not. It does exfoliate and make my skin feel soft after using. Don't think I'll be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn W

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive and have trouble find the perfect soap for my skin but this one works miracles. My bumpy skin started clearing up right away after just one use.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Love This Soap!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly my favorite soap ever. I didn't know it was for cellulite and can't speak too much of that being effective. This soap does however exfoliate amazingly well. I have not stopped keeping this stocked in the house since I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Cals

customer_reviews.title: this isn't the same soap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this before and I liked it. Upon reorder, the soap I received is not the same soap I expected. I did not order unscented soap and I'm very annoyed that Amazon will not accept return on this - I feel duped.
customer_reviews.author: jaw

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bar. Wished it was a bit bigger, but nice overall and the cost was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: This will take all oils off the skin. It is rough on the skin but that is why I bought it. The person I bought it for said it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Skin Care Bar
customer_reviews.text: This product amazing. I'm 53 and have tried to take care of my skin and have used the least expensive to some of the most expensive products and services. I feel this product accomplishes what it claims and the fragrance is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: 🙊 Nonia

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t firming the skin like it advertised but it cleans okay also used black soap that’s better
customer_reviews.author: James J.

customer_reviews.title: I like the grit in it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black seaweed bar. This does NOT smell good like others reviewed. I wouldn’t say it stinks though. It’s what I would expect a seaweed bar to smell like. It has a grit to it, which I like. Worth the $3 add on item price. Not sure if I’d pay more for it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Greatest bar of soap I’ve ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap bar - it’s completely relaxing and has enough coarse, natural ingredients to be a good exfoliant. I love how soft my skin is after using it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M LoRusso

customer_reviews.title: feels great
customer_reviews.text: Really feels good and gets rid of any dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this soap! It smells great and really gets the dry dead skin off.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliating soap!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin/ skin allergies that requires me to exfoliate daily. This bar of soap is an amazing exfoliator without drying out your skin. My skin has never been healthier or felt this good, will definitely be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Morning

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap! I bought 5 to start just to see if I see any changes; figuring it may take some time. I just finished the 1st bar and I already see changes in my arm flabbier! I am getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Keller

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My skin gets pretty dry with some soaps, but this one does the trick. It’s not slimy either, which you can get with seaweed soap sometimes. And it really is unscented, which is another perk. Go ahead, hippies.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Loved it and I’m hooked.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get enough of this soap! Only wish it was bigger . First time buyer and you have my absolute loyalty.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend, and needless to say, he loves it! Says it’s the perfect soap for men with sensitive, oily, and acne sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Gentle exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: My family likes this soap because everyone can use it. Gentle exfoliation.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Abrasive
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended if you have sensitive skin. For dry flaky skin it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar. It smells great and doesn't bother my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: beej

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Would buy this over and over. Great exfoliate and moisturizer. My skin feels amazing after wards. I don’t suggest for sensitive skin though. Makes my hubby break out every time.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Villano

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! It really tightens your skin you feel clean and it does not dry your skin out
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pelton

customer_reviews.title: How it makes the body feels during And after your Shower / bath
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and we live this soap. Will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Great soap!
customer_reviews.text: Great soap for just about all skin types, very nice gentle exfoliation and a very light scent. Lathers pretty well and leaves skin feeling clean but not too dry.
customer_reviews.author: Hello World :-)

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best exfoliating soap I’ve found! I like that it doesn’t have a strong smell. Lathers great and did I mention the exfoliation! The bar is slightly smaller than most which I actually prefer but just wanted to mention it so you’re aware and not disappointed if you like a bigger bar. Seriously, this is now my new favorite soap!
customer_reviews.author: Jlcsmith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell loved the feel and thought it helped. But think the bar used up very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Ann Schroder

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I rarely like this soap, it exfoliates well without scent and leaves my skin feeling smooth after I use
customer_reviews.author: SkiMom27

customer_reviews.title: Can't really distinguish
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell the difference with this soap. It doesn't do anything spectacular. maybe they have another one I can try but it's nothing I would jump up to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Exfoliates lightly, did dry my skin a little bit but still a quality soap.
customer_reviews.author: c.duncan

customer_reviews.title: This contains no seaweed at all.
customer_reviews.text: This is not real sea wood soap. Seafood soap is naturally green and had chunks that flake and exfoliates. This soap is black and is not exfoliating at all. This is a fake product.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Cellulite!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for over 2 weeks now and I can already see a difference in my skin. Some of my cellulite and all of my body acne faded and I’m so much softer after I shower 10/10 and the smell is subtle very earthy
customer_reviews.author: Cayra C.

customer_reviews.title: Non drying
customer_reviews.text: This soap is great and doesn't dry out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Ruff
customer_reviews.text: Been using it love it leaves my skin soft and smooth
customer_reviews.author: Xylina  Vela

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice exfoliating bar soap. I will be putting this on auto delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Blondgypsychick

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It came on time and it's a great soap I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Bullerin

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Just Okay, I do not notice a difference on my skin from regular use.
customer_reviews.author: sarah in austin texas

customer_reviews.title: I love that it a good price and it arrives on time
customer_reviews.text: This soap is great I love how it cut all the grease off ur skin smells good keep my skin glowing
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: my favorite soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap.....my favorite by far. The texture, the scent, the way it leaves my skin feeling soft and silky....I have somewhat sensitive skin - this soap does not dry or irritate it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower partner!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is heaven in a tube!!!! Product is perfect, not to thick, just right. I can tell a difference in my skin, so smooth. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Cleaning Lady

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for cellulite reduction and I have had success. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ash felk

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap so much I went on auto ship. I’ve noticed that my blemishes are even clearing up. Leaves you feeling squeaky clean
customer_reviews.author: Memequotes

customer_reviews.title: Nice scrubby soap
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap, great exfoliater. Not sure about the detox/ cellulite removing claims, but it's good soap.
customer_reviews.author: Taiknot

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Product was too drying for my skin. I wouldn’t purchase this soap for mom personal use. Others may find the product suitable but not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good product, smells bad but feels good. Definitely exfoliating. Doesn’t leave you with that sticky or dry feeling afterwards. I’m going to look into one with a different scent
customer_reviews.author: Taupe

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This soap is great. Love the smell, love the feel. It is soap..... not much more to say.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Skin feels so soft and smooth after using this soap.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Honestly feels a little like sandpaper on your skin when using - but not ...
customer_reviews.text: Feel refreshed and clean after using. Honestly feels a little like sandpaper on your skin when using - but not a bad thing. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ehardt

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliate but can be drying .
customer_reviews.text: Great for exfoliating but can be drying. Need to moisturize after.
customer_reviews.author: usha

customer_reviews.title: Great body soap!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It’s a little pricey but worth it! And it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't exfoliate
customer_reviews.text: I just wasn't rough enough to exfoliate the skin. It had a few exfoliating beads in it but that is not enough
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Love, love, love this soap. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amindofmyown

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: My first time purchasing. And I will definitely keep in my daily beauty regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Kenni R

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad, I knew all the "detox your cellulite" stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells bad, I knew all the "detox your cellulite" stuff was a sham but I thought it'd at least make my skin feel good, nope.
customer_reviews.author: Kory

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It makes my skin feel clean without stripping natural oils.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soap. The fragrance is pleasing and does a nice job of exfoliating the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Patti S

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap!!!! Will rebuy over & over again
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this soap to anyone wanting to not only exfoliate your skin but help w/ detoxifying the skin & cellulite relief on legs def great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin super soft and even
customer_reviews.text: Leaves skin super soft and even. Sometimes detox bars can be drying but this leaves skin balanced, clean, and exfoliated, and not at all dehydrated, which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap, it has became one of my fav and since I leave outside the US I always buy 4 to have in stock
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: The Seaweed Bath Co. Exfoliating Detox Body Soap, Unscented, Natural Organic Seaweed, Coconut Oil, Vegan, Paraben Free, 3.75 oz. (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Size:1 PackOur Detox Firming Soap deeply moisturizes, exfoliates, and purifies for smoother, firmer-looking skin. Best for those who want an exfoliating bar soap that detoxifies and improves the appearance of skin. Organic, sustainably hand-harvested bladderwrack seaweed from the coast of Maine with 65+ vitamins and minerals naturally detoxifies skin. Antioxidant-rich Arabica coffee gently exfoliates and improves the texture of skin. Cinnamon activates skin cells and increases skin elasticity. Hawaiian kukui oil, coconut oil, olive oil and sunflower oil hydrate and nourish skin. Charcoal powder draws out and washes away dirt, toxins and impurities on the skin. Use daily or as needed.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
feature_bullets: Our Exfoliating Detox Body Soap deeply moisturizes, exfoliates, and purifies for smoother, firmer-looking skin
Organic, sustainably-harvested bladderwrack seaweed with 65+ vitamins and minerals naturally detoxifies and promotes skin elasticity
Antioxidant-rich Arabica coffee gently exfoliates and improves the texture of skin
Cinnamon activates skin cells and increases skin elasticity
Hawaiian kukui oil, coconut oil, olive oil and sunflower oil hydrate and nourish skin
Hawaiian kukui oil, coconut oil, olive oil and sunflower oil hydrate and nourish skin
Charcoal powder draws out and washes away dirt, toxins and impurities on the skin
Vegan, cruelty free (no animal testing) and Leaping Bunny certified
